title: Introduction to Event Streaming! Episode 2
description:
In this episode, we take the next step on our journey to build scalable and efficient distributed applications! Using foundations learned in the first episode, we take a deeper dive into event streaming, learn messaging Design Patterns and apply them with writing Producers and Consumers to solve problems. In the second part of the session we will use the various messaging semantics Apache Pulsar has to offer to produce, consume and even query events with SQL, as if they were actual database rows!
